thread.title: Lee

author: Lee
title: Lee
text: Arrived as scheduled, was polite, efficient and helpful. What surprised me the most is that I had tried a couple of price comparison websites and this was only two pounds more. To save a drive to a freezing cold tyre centre, wait for half hour to an hour reading grubby "Dentist Weekly" and be told your pads, disks, exhaust and tracking all need fixing has got to be worth two pounds!
